challenges.title: Welcome to the LearnBench
description: Welcome to the LearnBench.  Click the 'Go to my next step' button to continue.
Great! This is how you will complete several lessons, by reading and clicking next. Please always read and understand every word before continuing.
You will keep going through each step until you get to the 'Finish lesson' button. When you click 'Finish lesson' the next lesson will start.

challenges.title: The Lesson Types
description: There are different types of lessons.  Some are steps to read like these.  Some are videos to watch. Others are coding lessons where you will write code.
Also, there will be commitments to make along the way and finally projects to complete.

challenges.title: ** Commit to Read and Understand
description: It is critical that you do not skim the reading.
Commit to read and understand all the words in each lesson.

challenges.title: The LearnBench Windows
description: There are 4 different windows that are used for the LearnBench.
They are the 'All Lessons', 'Lesson', 'Code Editor' and the 'Preview'.
Not all lessons use all of the windows. You can show and hide these windows by clicking on their buttons on the upper right in the Navigation Bar.
We suggest you hide the 'All Lessons' window so that you have more room to read and write code.

challenges.title: Coding Lessons
description: On a coding lesson you must complete the requested objective. You complete the task by clicking the 'Run Tests' button found in the 'Lesson' window.
When you click 'Run Tests' a series of tests will run to check if you have met the coding objective.
If you have not passed all the tests then read the error messages to get information on what to correct. Keep correcting and testing your work. Re-read the lesson to get more help.
Some lessons can be very challenging, and you may get stuck. We will teach you later how to get help. If necessary you can use the 'All Lessons' window to skip to the next lesson.
